com.oprahs_voice.android.movies.models.main

Class MovieAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.oprahs_voice.android.movies.models.main.MovieAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FavoritesAdapter 

    public class MovieAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    This class provides and updates information in the main view to display an ordered list of movies that the user can select from or learn more about.
    Author:
    John Weber, Matthew Moretz, Luke Orr
